"Etoile Skills":
"Etoile has many Class Skills that support your party members and other nearby players.

To use them most effectively, try to remain aware of the people around you and assist them when they need support."

"Over Drive
Recovers HP and PP for all party members, including yourself. Maximum PP also increases for a period of time.

Recast Save
Reduces the reactivation timer on other party members' active skills."

"Just Guard PP Aile
Recovers PP for all party members, including yourself, when you Just Guard an enemy attack.

Around Mate Up
Increases the HP recovery of recovery items for all nearby players, and adds a PP recovery effect to them."
